venue.name: Microsoft New England Research & Development Center (NERD)

item.description:
Boston Tech Meetup for July, doors open at 6:30, presentations start at 7:30 in the Mann/Sampson/Paul rooms.

1. Yair Marcow /  MavenWorks and MavenScape

2. Krishna Ramchandran /  UberSense / @ubersenseinc

3. Keith Ballinger / Ravid

4. Robert Gray /  DayTripsAtHand / @DayTripsAtHand

5. Alex Flint /  Relaxing Stories / @relaxingstories

6. David Zhou /  ePowerhouse / @EPHGlobal

 

Please use the hashtag #bnt7 to promote and discuss this event on twitter.

 

Use Plug to discover interesting people before, during and after the event! Plug connects you with people you should meet and gives you an easy way to get event info, follow the event conversation and share event happenings on twitter, facebook and LinkedIn. Visit http://GetPlug.com to sign up and download Plug mobile apps.
item.name: Boston New Tech Meetup July 2011 #bnt7
